name: CHORA AGORA, RI AGORA
description:
digital remix of a nankin drawing. special edition for #oBRjkt2.
cry now, laugh now.

*

good things are not rewards for the suffering.
bad things are not sacrifices to be compensated.
good and bad are not opposites, but always two sides of the same experience.
to wait until "everything is good" before you celebrate life, laugh and thank is to watch while your hopes perish and dismay takes over slowly.
to not allow yourself to suffer or feel bad in order to avoid "disturbing" a good moment is to turn happiness into a burden you carry no matter the cost.
life sustains itself through the coexistence of contradictory experiences. any stability is illusory.
to look only at sadness or at happiness, as if one nullifies the other, is to deprive yourself of an all-encompassing life.
 
(wether it's bad or good, I don't wait for life to get worse to give attention to my sorrows, nor do I spare any smile that dares to come up amidst difficult times)


-- @blueskozmico
